پکیج API‍‌ ارائه شده....message: The API package offered by Simutel is...

پکیج API‍‌ ارائه شده در سیموتل بسیار غنی.message: Simotel's user interface is designed in such a way that the user can easily implement his scenario without getting involved in the details, the beating heart of the Call Center, the dial plan gives the user the ability to create any call scenario by just dragging a few components on the page and Connect them together to implement.

در بخش گزارشات شما می‌توانید به راحتی سا.message: In the reports section, you can easily get the simplest application reports from the system without any trouble, on the other hand, if you need advanced and personalized reports, you will be provided with many filters, one of the important features of the reports section is the ability to display data graphically and abstractly.

رابط کاربری سیموتل به نحوی طراحی شده است.message: Simotel's user interface is designed in such a way that the user can easily implement his scenario without getting involved in the details, the beating heart of the Call Center, the dial plan gives the user the ability to create any call scenario by just dragging a few components on the page and Connect them together to implement.

siteDesc.message: Simotel Wiki is the main documentation hub for learning how to use and manage Simotel's PBX and Call Center systems, as well as a guide to web services for developers and programmers
